mosparams.name: Keyword Variable Parameter File
mosparams.author: Green Mountain Information Technology Consulting
mosparams.copyright: This component is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosparams.description: Database Query is a Mambo query manager.

param.name: TEXT_INPUT_WIDTH
param.label: Text Box Width
param.description: Width of a text input box for the text input template

param.name: TEXT_AREA_HEIGHT
param.label: Text Area Height
param.description: Height of a textarea input box for the textarea input template

param.name: TEXT_AREA_WIDTH
param.label: Text Area Width
param.description: Width of a textarea input box for the textarea input template

param.name: ESCAPE_OVERRIDE
param.label: Escape Override
param.description: Do not escape the replacement value that will be used in the query

param.name: VARIABLE_TEMPLATE_ID
param.label: Variable Template ID
param.description: Template ID for the variable's template file.

param.name: ZP_FORM_CUSTOM_MASK
param.label: Custom Mask
param.description: Custom mask for the user input form if Custom Mask has been selected as a Form Validation.
